node.detail_zh: 患者沒有病徵。（衞生防護中心於 8 月 3 日記者會表示檢測中心錯誤將接受檢測人士的陰性結果當為確診，此個案編號會重新編配給 8 月 3 日的確診患者。衛生防護中心於 8 月 17 日將患者定性為無病徵的患者。原本陰性結果人士居於慈正邨正和樓，為緊密接觸者但接觸日期已過兩星期。）
node.detail_en: The patient exhibited no symptoms. (The CHP announced on the press conference on Aug 3 that the testing centre had mistakenly labelled a negative result as a confirmed diagnosis. This case number will be allocated to a confirmed patient on Aug 3. On Aug 17, he was listed as a confirmed asymptomatic case. The original individual who tested negative lives in Tsz Ching Estate Ching Wo House, Tsz Wan Shan, and was a close contact to a confirmed case, however it has been two weeks since the date of contact.)
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_zh: 九龍灣國際展貿中 心
node.location_en: Kowloon Bay International Trade & Exhibition Centre
